pullRequest.title: [thing] Dynamic state/command provider should not return original description
pullRequest.bodyText:
Dynamic state/command provider should not return original description
Added integration test for CommandDescriptionProvider

See https://community.openhab.org/t/dynamic-state-options-not-showing-up/95625
Signed-off-by: Christoph Weitkamp github@christophweitkamp.de

commit.message:
Clarify return values for implementation

Signed-off-by: Christoph Weitkamp <github@christophweitkamp.de>

Dynamic state/command provider should not return original descritpion

Signed-off-by: Christoph Weitkamp <github@christophweitkamp.de>

nodes.bodyText: Question is if we should just ignore these wrong implementations in bindings or if we should throw an exception here and force the developer to fix it.
